text: İbrahim Ayhan (10 February 1968 – 20 September 2018) was a Turkish politician. He was of Kurdish origin. He was a Member of Parliament for his hometown of Şanlıurfa from 12 June 2011 until his death. He was born in Siverek, Turkey. Ayhan died on 20 September 2018 in Erbil, Turkey from a heart attack, aged 50.Milletvekilliği düşürülen HDP'li İbrahim Ayhan hayatını kaybetti ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Turkish politicians
title: İbrahim Ayhan
